info.title: Removing a bonded or teamed device

abstract.para: Use this procedure to remove a bonded or teamed device and restore the included network interfaces to their original, separate configuration.

step.para: Hide the configuration file by renaming it from /etc/sysconfig/network/ifcfg-DEVICE_NAME to /etc/sysconfig/network/.ifcfg-DEVICE_NAME.
Alternatively, if you definitely do not need the configuration anymore, remove the file instead of renaming it.
To re-enable the network interfaces that were included in the device, restore their original configuration from the backup files.
